---
title: "Binomial 5 Results Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rbinom-0.3-5.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Binom0.3.5Call <- stream_in(file("new-calls/rbinom-0.3-5-Call-Revised-0806.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Binom0.3.5Result <- stream_in(file("new-calls/rbinom-0.3-5_0806_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Binom.03.5.OpenAI <- left_join(Binom0.3.5Call,Binom0.3.5Result)
Full.Binom.03.5.0806 <- left_join(Binom0.3.5$params, Binom.03.5.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Binom.03.5.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Binom.03.5.0806$Outcome <- map_chr(Binom0.3.5$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Binom0.3.5Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Binom.03.5.0806$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Binom.03.5.0806, file="Full.Binom.03.5.0806.RData")
```
